description: Defines a theming utility class 'AppTheme' for Flutter apps, providing a light theme configuration with specific color schemes and component styles.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class providing theme data for the Flutter application, specifically a light theme conforming to Material 3 standards.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured with a light color scheme, visual styles for components such as AppBar, NavigationRail, Card, and Input decorations.
